topline_md: Recent updates in NYC include a public school student ordered deported by a NJ judge, a surge in Amtrak police arrests at a Penn Station bathroom, and a tragic incident where a man died after being set on fire in Brooklyn. Additionally, NYC is experiencing scattered showers and potential thunderstorms.

emergencies_risks.title: Emergencies & Risks
emergencies_risks.summary_md:
### Emergencies & Risks

Multiple incidents in NYC raise concerns about public safety and emergency response effectiveness.

- NYC public school student Dylan faces deportation after being detained by ICE, ordered by a NJ immigration judge. transportation.title: Transportation
transportation.summary_md:
### Transportation

New transportation initiatives in New York City aim to enhance safety and efficiency for commuters.

- NYC's e-bike speed limit is set to launch just before the election, according to Mayor Adams. [Read](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMinwFBVV95cUxPd1FHZk9ZdlZjdmRkb1JQTlpSU2FkMDlEQ3MtVWhhSEl3LUJ3dUxsc0hwMTJhTHNQZWRPMERVaEhwdGR0Sk5ONXhmeWlXeC1IM01KY3VwRTZrSndJekFWTVQ0N1JZWWxMSF9STWpnbjNPa0s2NlMyU2sybElXX3NiODVlcU1xcVBxVUhFaVg3TDVDSjA1Q25FMFpYaDNUWDQ?oc=5)
- The DOT's Flatbush Plan is highlighted as a model for implementing fast bus services in Brooklyn.
